Tucson knew that fuel reserves needed to be replenished.  Lucky for him he =
had emergency reserves subspaced within his draconic body.  He opens up the=
 left front haunch compartment and reveals a line of canisters.

" I'm sure=
 many of you need fuel.  Help yourselves but try to consider others who are=
 Also in need of refueling." I have a second reserve on my right side."

Wh=
ile with Waspinator, Straight Shot giggles with delight.  She loved a littl=
e thrill seeking and being almost dropped was actually exciting to her.  

=
" That's okay, it was actually kinda fun.  I've never had the opportunity t=
o fly and I'm enjoying it." 

She transforms into her robot mode and catche=
s hold to Waspinator's spindly legs, keeping a sure but gentile grip on it.=
  She keeps her beacon on track mode while flying with what could very well=
 be an evolving friendship.  She looks up to Waspinator with a smile and a =
thumbs up.

" We're still on track, and my beacon is  rapidly flashing.  We=
 must be getting close."

She now swings herself up onto his back, carefull=
y minding his wings.  She proves to be a very light passenger as she rides =
contently on the Predacon's back.

"I never thought that I would ever make =
friends among enemies but, I think I just did.  Nobody has ta know anything=
 except for us.   What'd ya say?  Friends?  I promise never ta tell Leo or =
Rodimus.  Tucson will understand but I don't think the other two will."

Sh=
e couldn't exactly tell what was happening to her but whatever it was, cert=
ainly didn't bother her in the least.

Perpetually on the move and constant=
ly busy.
